articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: MLB owners lock out players amid league's 1st work stoppage since 1995 | CBC Sports
articles.description: Major League Baseball plunged into its first work stoppage in a quarter-century when the sport's collective bargaining agreement expired Wednesday night and owners immediately locked out players in a move that threatens spring training and opening day.
articles.content: Major League Baseball plunged into its first work stoppage in a quarter-century when the sport's collective bargaining agreement expired Wednesday night and owners immediately locked out players in a… [+6724 chars]

articles.author: Howard Fendrich/AP
articles.title: WTA Says It Is Suspending Tournaments in China Over Lingering Concerns About Peng Shuai
articles.description: The WTA's move is the strongest public stand against China taken by a sports body — and one that could cost the WTA millions of dollars.
articles.content: The suspension of all WTA tournaments in China because of concerns about the safety of Peng Shuai, a Grand Slam doubles champion who accused a former government official there of sexual assault, coul… [+6783 chars]

articles.title: Kenny Vaccaro retiring from NFL after eight seasons to launch esports organization
articles.description: Longtime NFL safety Kenny Vaccaro announced his retirement on Wednesday. Vaccaro will now focus on a future in esports with his new organization, G1.
articles.content:
Kenny Vaccaro is calling it a career and immediately stepping into a new, virtual arena.
